body:
Hello there,
I have decided to see what the Avicus community thinks about this:
I've thought about making a new Avicus clan instead of the old one. This clan can have anyone that is in the Avicus community. 
The clan name would be chosen from which ever team wins the current Avicus Tournament that is lead by Pelpelajax.
The clan will have a temporary username for now until a new one is made for the new clan name. It will be called Avicus and will be made in a few hours.

Rules:
1) Be respectful to all members and give a warm welcome to them or just say hello.
2) Don't be mean to them and say "Your base is terrible", however you can give tips on how to make it better.
3) Don't argue with each other.
4) Have fun and help each other :)
5) This one is for staff members: Don't talk about important staff things, however all players can still talk about general Avicus stuff.

Clan Leader:
It will be myself if everyone else agrees (it is a community clan so we have to have everyones' opinions) or we will do a poll vote.... put your username down below if you'd like to be in the poll.... but remember that it could be me running it if we don't do the poll.

I will be looking forward to seeing your responses, it doesn't matter if you don't agree with this.... just say.

Kind Regards,
Aqoi.

replies.body: How does town hall levels have to do with Leadership?

replies.body: When you download it, there's a tutorial explaining everything on how to play and it is difficult to get in a clan at the start since you don't have much money at the beginning, but you'll eventually have to buy this thing called a "Clan Castle" and you can join a clan after you buy it :).
